para: The TogglePin command is called by the Pin Nodes toolbox in the graphics window. It toggles whether or not a &node; is pinned. TogglePin operates on the &skel; given as an argument. When run from the graphics window, this will be the topmost &skel; displayed in the window.
The skeleton parameter is the fully-qualified name of the &skel; on which to operate.
The point parameter is the position at which the mouse was clicked. The &skel; &node; closest to the mouse click will be pinned or unpinned.
